name: The Lights Were Off
description:
@FranklinsGhost

A quiz game about the Carnation Revolution in Portugal

Still need to add sound effects and music but for now this will do until I get some more free time.

Controls

Game can be played with the mouse or keyboard.

Any key to continue and keys 1,2,3 to select the different answers. R also restarts the game.

Android version seems to work well on my mobile which I'm happy about.
